name: atr_directional_change
description: Price-action driven detection using ATR Directional Change. Instead of blindly iterating every N bars, this approach processes data bar-by-bar and triggers pattern detection ONLY when ATR confirms a new market extreme (swing high or swing low). This aligns software logic with market structure.
improvements: Detection triggered at confirmed swing points, not arbitrary intervals
ATR-adaptive: Adjusts to current market volatility
More efficient: Skips consolidation periods with no structural change
More accurate: Aligned with market structure (QML = swing highs/lows)
Reduced noise: Fewer redundant pattern checks

comparison_to_v1.1.0.expected_improvement: Fewer triggers, same or better pattern quality
